summary: Adds a Male and Female Orc to Dushnikh Yal's Mine.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][size=3][color=#b6d7a8]I noticed that I can't seem to find a good looking Male Orc, a few good looking females, yeah.[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]So here I go, bringing you Orc Siblings. :)[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/bEH6G6l.png[/img]

[color=#b6d7a8]Galtu and Gotal are young Orcs, who live in Dushnikh Yal. Both know how to fight and deal with annoying People.[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]The one year older Galtu makes sure that her Brother won't die on the Battlefield, since he loves to rush right in.[/color]

[color=#b6d7a8]Both start at lvl 1 and level with the Player, Galtu uses a two handed Battleaxe, while Gotal uses Dual Wielding.[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Both can be married aswell.[/color]


[/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/GywEse2.png[/img]
[color=#b6d7a8]
S.A.M - Shape Atlas for Men from vectorplexus.com[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Fine Face Textures for Men - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Demoniac - High Quality Glossy Female Body Texture 8K 4K 2K - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019[/color]
